{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Rare Bone |image = [[File:Rare_Bone Updated.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Rare Bone''. |value = 3 {{Diamonds}} |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Rare Hold Items]] *[[Dungeons]] |helditem =
*[[File:Cubone.png|30px]]Cubone *[[File:Marowak.png|30px]]Marowak *[[File:Dwebble.png|30px]]Dwebble *[[File:Crustle.png|30px]]Crustle }} ==Description== The '''Rare Bone''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Rare Bone has a value of 3 [[Diamonds]] {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Rare Bone appears in the Underground as a 6x3 sized object.

[[File:RareBoneMine.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Rare Bones can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], as [[Rare Hold Items]] from [[File:Cubone.png|30px]] Cubone, [[File:Marowak.png|30px]] Marowak, [[File:Dwebble.png|30px]] Dwebble, and [[File:Crustle.png|30px]] Crustle, and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Tower|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Distortion World|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Castelia Sewers|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Twist Mountain|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Malie Garden|Legendary}} |} |}
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Underground Items]]
